column1: hello mr. wilkins, what brings you in today
column3: hello doctor.  i am so glad to see you.

column1: can you tell me a little about your issue
column3: i'm sorry, i don't understand that question. would you restate it?
i was hoping you could help me with my back pain, it really hurts! it has been awful.   i can barely even tie my shoes.
it is mostly in my lower back.
the pain started about four or five days ago.

column1: is there anything that makes the pain worse
column3: [ pain3 ]bending down and moving makes it feel a lot worse.  the other day i couldn't even pick up a car part off of the bottom shelf.

column2: what do you do for a living
column3: i am an auto mechanic.  i have a garage a couple of blocks from here.  i do repairs and custom restorations.
column4: what do you do for a living

column1: is there anything that makes it better
column3: [ sadness2 ]the only thing that seems to help some is ibuprofen, and that doesn't help all that much.

column1: are you taking any other medications
column2: are you taking any other medication
column3: i am taking baby aspirin once a day as a preventative for my heart. it was prescribed by my doctor. she said it would be a good idea at my age.
column4: are you taking any other medication

column1: hello mr. wilkins, my name is dr. savinoff. do you prefer mr. wilkins
column3: i'm afraid i don't understand that question.

column1: why did you come into the office today
column3: i was hoping you could help me with my back pain, it really hurts! it has been awful.   i can barely even tie my shoes.

column1: that sounds rough. we will definitely try and find out what is wrong with your back. doyou have any other topics for discussion
column3: i'm afraid i don't understand that question.

column1: do you wish to discuss anything other than your back pain today
column4: are you having any other pain
